title: What the hell where is the moral ground in this!?

embed.description: Yesterday the Border Force Act 2015 came into effect, effectively making it illegal for people working in Australian-run detention centres like doctors, nurses, teachers and childcare workers from speaking out about the horrific conditions asylum seekers are held in.

body:
There are no positives of this law. 
Everyone already knows rape, child abuse and brutal use of force is happening in these detentions and now Tony Abbott and his stupid lackeys are trying to cover it up by shotgunning this law through parliament. 
Labor Party says, "Sure Tony!"

This country is so fucked when at the moment, as it stands Tony Abbott is the one that will be re-elected into parliament come 2016 elections. 
Heartless Libs.

P.S. Nerf Kalista. She doesn't need the slow from Rend once she acquires a decent amount of attack speed. She can chase and run effectively without it.

replies.body:
What is stupid about it? You invade a country illegally you should expect to be treated like a criminal, because you are.

For too long people have illegally invaded Australia and received heightened benefits and have been given a good lifestyle.

Illegally immigrate into North Korea and see what happens to you.

It would be easier to just give them 1 .50 cal bullet each, send it to them directly at 400fps.

Then they do this when you let them in:

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2721230/Thats-boy-Australian-jihadists-seven-year-old-son-poses-decapitated-head-Syrian-solider.html

>
> Then they do this when you let them in:
> 
> http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2721230/Thats-boy-Australian-jihadists-seven-year-old-son-poses-decapitated-head-Syrian-solider.html

Yep, they don't deserve shit. Not all of them are terrorists, but all of them are leeches.

They can find other jobs if they want to talk that much

People come in on a boat, then hate your culture and they decide to go away and fight for terrorists, and then cry about how bad it is and beg to come back. 

Not targeting specific groups.

If they want cuddles they can go to Europe.
I can't express how ignorant and stupid your comment is.
Maybe the idiots should just stay in their own fucking country.
well try to runaway  from vayne firzt and talk zhit
